page.title: 11EXTERIOR OF THE CHURCH
page.content: A grandson,died aged 11 months,and a granddaughter died at 10 months. We do not know of any members of the family still living in the neighbourhood. The churchyard has a number of yew trees; some have grown unchecked, while some have been clipped. There is a notice board outside the church_this was presented by W.J.Thompson, Cavanbuoy,in memory of loved ones.The board gives the name of the minister the Rev. S MacMillan and the time of the Sunday worship,which is 12.30 p.m,and the sunday school which is at 11.30 am.At the top of the board there is the burning bush,and underneath is written"ardens sed virens",which is latin,meaning burning but living.
